divs: Sighting Detailshi my name is scott adair back in 1974 my mom was yelling for me to hurry to the window on the second floor.there was a machine the size of 3 or 4 cars hovering outside window.it was round with lights that had colors I didn���t recognize.it made absolutely no sound then it disappeared suddenly.it didn���t have the appearance of gradually taking off.I assume that it left so fast that it gave the appearance of disappearing.my mother and I saw this together.I don���t think it was a hoak or a joke because even today nothing in this world could do that.you are the first person I have told.this happened in cranston rhode island.
